simplesect.para: Implement this interface to control instance creation of serialized type. Static method with signature: object CreateInstance (RuntimeSerializationInfo _info) is invoked when creating serialized object instance. RuntimeSerializationInfo contains all the initializer values that were formerly serialized. So get all the initializer values from RuntimeSerializationInfo and create object instance.
